model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    A ball is characterized by : - the location of its center : vector _location - a velocity : vector _velocity - a mass : _mass - a radius : _radius - a track : a history of its positions
